cause.description:
Meningitis is a disease that appears out of no where. Young healthy children are dieing from this disease. We believe that proper education and knowledge of Meningitis may help save the life of your loved ones.
Please go to Meningitis Canada (on Facebook) and become a member.
1. Education and Knowledge of Meningitis
cause.mission: Give education and knowledge to help prevent Meningitis
cause.name: Meningitis Prevention
